messages.message:
Hi team,

As you know, we recently changed the default OCR from google to microsoft on ib.com (http://ib.com) as a cost saving measure. We are now planning to make the same change in the dogfood environment as well.
This change will take place tomorrow*, 21 Sept 12PM IST*. Since this will break some golden tests, we are requesting the test owners to update their respective flows from the default OCR engine to msft-ocr by *Friday 23 Sept* so that we can have our golden-tests back to green before the weekend starts.
This doc is tracking the golden-tests that need to be updated: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15dtthHs0XyHJzblgUhthVEHotjHL-zmph5ysqvHeXVk/edit. Please update here once your changes are complete. Thanks! :babyyoda:

Tagging owners for the tests that need to be changed: @Anil @lydia @Aayush @Franklin Chian @Elan Sharony

cc: @Hari @Rakesh
by `dogfood environment` do you mean dogfood, UAT and release sandboxes as well?

@shiqi, just the dogfood for now. We are splitting the golden tests into separate directories by the release branches so tge changes fir dogfood won't propogate to other environments. However, we do want to propagate tholis change to 22.09 and 22.08
